text: Hianagi nagri'ma nahe frisuta tamagrama keta antahitama hanazana, keni'a omane'nea ne' nahe frigahazankino nagri kora kumi'mofo knazamo'a tamagrite'ene ama rankumate'ene maka ama ana kumapima nemaniza vahete'ene megahie. Na'ankure maka amama huama'ma hu'na tamasamua nanekea tamage nanekegino, Ra Anumzamo hunantege'na eme huama hugeta tamagra'a tamagesafinti antahi'naze.
